meanings.definition: To write or engrave on a scroll or parchment.
meanings.sent1: She inscrolled her name on the ancient parchment.
meanings.sent2: The scribe inscrolled the important message on the scroll.
meanings.sent3: The wizard inscrolled a spell on the parchment, but accidentally erased it.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were inscrolled on the scroll of time.
meanings.sent5: The artist inscrolled intricate designs on the parchment with care.

meanings.definition: To record or document in a scroll or parchment.
meanings.sent1: He inscrolled the historical events on the ancient scroll.
meanings.sent2: The historian inscrolled the details of the battle on the parchment.
meanings.sent3: The chef inscrolled his secret recipe on the parchment for safekeeping.
meanings.sent4: The poet inscrolled his emotions on the scroll of his heart.
meanings.sent5: The explorer inscrolled the map of the unknown lands on the parchment.
